overview:
CEO and Founder - RobotAppStore.com

Mr. Inbar has a rich, multi-disciplinary career in the Hi-Tech industry as an experienced executive. His experience includes online content publishing, e-commerce, affiliate marketing, machine learning algorithms and robotics. He founded RobotsLAB, a distributor of Aldebaran Robotics, selling NAO robots, developing robotics software and teaching robotics. He is also part of the founding committee of a non-profit Robotics Association. Before that he co-founded massiveImpact and Affilimob, the first affiliate network to offer results-based marketing model over mobile networks where he served as CTO, leading the company to global deployment which generated more than $25million sales, and participated in raising 15M USD from three VCs. Prior to that he managed the Internet services department of the second largest cellular operators in Israel, Orange Israel. (TASE: PTNR.TA) Previously, Inbar was Head of R&D for Israel’s leading Internet portal, www.walla.co.il (TASE: WALA.TA)
